lead_paragraph: SEGUIE--Dr. Munir Nader, died peacefully of natural causes on Tuesday, February 23, 2016 at his home in Elmhurst, Queens. He was born in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic on January 13, 1935. Dr. Nader was married to Barbara Nader DeMagistris, resident of Queens, who died last year after 52 years of marriage. He was the son of Laila Seguie from Beino, Lebanon and Abraham Nader from Tripoli, Lebanon and brother to Odette, Arnold, David, Ricardo and Samir. Dr. Nader graduated from school of Medicine from the Universidad of Santo Domingo on June 19, 1959, and specialized in Psychiatry in New York, working in the Knickerbocker Hospital among others. He practiced in Queens for more than 30 years. He lives behind no children or wife but had many friends that loved him dearly and nieces and nephews that will miss him very much. He was 81 years old. May God rest his soul. A memorial service will be held in his honor on Friday, February 26 at 10:30am at St. Joan of Arc, located at 3527 82nd Street, Jackson Heights, NY 11372. 1/3
